snippet.title: Happy Halloween
snippet.description: VideoHave a lovely Halloween. I thought The Office Halloween episode (Spooked) this past week was actually pretty good. In fact, the first season without Michael Scott has been surprisingly entertaining. And I watched the Grimm pilot, which was fun. But it's hard to beat the Muppets. Follow me on Twitter or Facebook. [...] read »

snippet.title: New 'Snow White and the Huntsman' Trailer Is as Dark as a Real Fairy-Tale
snippet.description: As some of you may know, there are not one but two Snow White movies coming out this year: Snow White and the Huntsman and Mirror, Mirror. From the trailer of Mirror, Mirror, I can already tell you I won’t be seeing it: it looks silly rather than funny, plus it uses the title of one of my favorite Star Trek episodes without giving me Spock’s [...] read »

snippet.title: Bruised Women And Big, Bad Wolves: The Noir Of 'The Wolf Among Us'
snippet.description: Snow Whites, Red Roses and Blue Dahlias - when we talk about Telltale Games' The Wolf Among Us as noir, what do we mean? read »

snippet.title: What Made 'Oz' So Great And Powerful? Starlight Runner's Jeff Gomez Tells Us
snippet.description: VideoAlready topping $100 million at the domestic box office and more than $70 million overseas as it heads into it's second weekend of release (during which it will likely add another $80+ million worldwide to its total), Disney's it Oz the Great and Powerful is 2013's first true blockbuster. But why [...] read »
